text.section: The intent of this subtitle is to provide an additional administrative remedy to a claimant for a violation of this subtitle or a regulation that relates to this subtitle.

section.section: This subtitle provides administrative remedies only.
This subtitle does not provide or prohibit a private right or cause of action to, or on behalf of, a claimant or other person in any state.
This subtitle does not impair the right of a person to seek redress in law or equity for conduct that otherwise is actionable.
